PublicHaus
PublicHaus

    Hats

    PublicHaus uses the Hats Protocol for our organizational graph, roles, agents, and permissions.

    Hats Tree

    Top Hat

    Corresponds to the Hats Tree Controller Safe attached to the DAO.

    HSG Owner

    • Elected Reward Committee
    • Contractooors
    • Platformoooors
    • Protocolooors

    Champion Admin

    Champions

    Champion Tree

    Groups

    • Champion Admin
    • Roles
    • Cross Chain Assets

    More ephemeral sub roles and daos that are more easily spun up and managed by champions.

    Roles

    Roles directly under the DAO. Can only be changed through proposal and share holder (Champion) consensus.

    Contractoors

    Manages DAO owned contracts. This is for doing upgrades and managing on chain registries

    XComs

    Insures Communications between different roles. Is Admin on twitter and other external comms accounts

    Elected Reward Committee

    Seasonal Election through random sortition of Champions. Manages distro of seasonal retro rewards.

    Core maintainooor

    Admins on the HausDAO github repo

    Platformoooors

    platformooors stream

    Protocolooors

    Steward of the protocol budget stream

    protocolooors stream
